remarks: The value of a substituted variable.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mrsubvr.v $e |- V = ( mVR ` T ) $.
mrsubvr.r $e |- R = ( mREx ` T ) $.
mrsubvr.s $e |- S = ( mRSubst ` T ) $.
mrsubvr $p |- ( ( F : A --> R /\ A C_ V /\ X e. A ) -> ( ( S ` F ) ` <" X "> ) = ( F ` X ) ) $.
